text: thank you for the star this is live dot

Leeds uses it to chat online but last
year she started getting abuse and
threats photos of her home were posted
online and she was dared to try and
leave the house
one user threatened to force himself on
her she was even told go kill yourself
and her address was posted on Twitter as
a house to burgle this has legit just
ruined my life
like I used to be an outgoing person and
now I'm just getting there trying to get
back old so with more people using
smartphones and social media police are
getting more reports of malicious
communications offenses that can include
threats sent by online trolls abusive
text messages pornographic images and
cyberbullying research by the BBC has
found more than 200 offenses are being
recorded by police in England and Wales
every day the number has risen by 85
percent over the past two years I think
this is the tip of an iceberg I think as
policing in society changes into the
digital age this is only going to
increase and providers government law
enforcement and users all need to get
ready how we protect people more
effectively and then how we bring the
